price: Kuma wanda ya yi ɗã'ã ga Allah da ManzonSa, kuma ya ji tsõron Allah, ya kuma bĩ Shi da taƙawa to waɗannan sũ ne mãsu babban rabo.
arabic: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخۡشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقۡهِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yuṭiʿi al-laha warasūlahu wayakhsha al-laha wayattaqhi fa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
